text.section:
An employee subject to this subtitle shall receive the following written performance appraisals at 6-month intervals based on the employee's entry-on-duty date:
an informal mid-year performance appraisal; and
an end-of-year performance appraisal with an overall performance rating in accordance with § 7-503 of this subtitle.

An employee's performance may be rated on a performance appraisal as follows:
outstanding;
satisfactory; or
unsatisfactory.
